+   }

+     color: #b8c77e;
+     opacity: 0.86;
+     font-weight: 400;
+   }
+ 
+   /* Custom dropdown styling */
+   .f8-select option {
+     background: rgba(16, 30, 23, 0.95);
+     color: #fff;
+     padding: 0.75rem 1rem;
+     border: none;
+   }
+

+     display: none;
+   }
